An Officer and a Gentleman (2DVD Special Edition) [1982]
Disc one: Movie
Disc two: Special Features

A young man must complete his work at a Navy Flight school to become an
aviator, with the help of a tough gunnery sergeant and his new girlfriend.

Starring: Richard Gere, Debra Winger, David Keith, Robert Loggia, Lisa Blount,
          Lisa Eilbacher, Louis Gossett Jr.
Director: Taylor Hackford


Video: MPEG2PAL 16:9 720x576

Audio: English and Deutsch Dolby AC-3/2 (disc one)
       Commentary by Director Taylor Hackford Dolby AC-3/2 (Eng, Deutsch subs)
       English Dolby AC-3/2 (disc two)
